title: 10 Ka Dum
resume: 10 Ka Dum was an Indian version of the popular international reality game show Power of 10, and aired on Sony Entertainment Television. The show was hosted by popular Bollywood actor Salman Khan. According to reports, the show helped Sony TV regain its third position in the Indian television ratings.
